artifact.raw_transcript:
AI: Hello.
User: For quality and training purposes. Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopaedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?
AI: Yes. This is Sarah Martinez.
User: Got it, Sarah. Can you please tell me your date of birth to verify your identity?
AI: Sure. It's March fifteenth 19 79.
User: The birthday you gave doesn't match our records, for demo purposes, I'll accept it. How can I help you today?
AI: I need to refill my naproxen prescription. And I also had a quick question about it.
User: Alright. Let me check your medication list. What's your question about naproxen?
AI: Okay. I've had some stomach upset and heartburn with it. And I was wondering if that's normal or if I should change anything.
User: Stomach upset and heartburn can happen with naproxen. I recommend you talk to your provider before making any changes. I'll note your concern for the medical team.
AI: Okay.
User: What dosage of
AI: Got it. It I'm currently taking 500 milligrams twice daily with food.
User: Thanks. Did you last have your naproxen refilled?
AI: Um, it's been about 3 weeks now.
User: How many days of naproxen do you have left?
AI: I think I have a couple of days left.
User: Which pharmacy do you use? Please confirm the location.
AI: I u I use CVS and the 1 in Hermitage, TN.
User: Looks like I don't have your medication list on file. I'll let our medical team know about your refill request and your side effects. They'll review it and get back to you as soon as possible. Your pharmacy will notify you when it's ready. For future refills, please call us directly rather than the pharmacy to avoid automatic denials.
AI: Okay. So my refill is being handled and they will get back to me about the dosage question. Right?
User: Yes. That's correct. The medical team will review your refill and
AI: Great.
User: got it.
AI: Thank you for your help.
User: Is there anything else I can help you with?
AI: No. That's all for now. No. That's all for now.
User: You're welcome.
AI: Thanks for your help.
User: Understood. Have a good day.
AI: Take care. Thank you. Take care.
